data.actual_result: The highlight doesn't reach all the way.
data.expected_result: It should highlight all the way, or the font should be smaller.
data.short_description: "Create" highlight on server create screen doesn't highlight all the way.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll all the way down to the + button. - Click on the "Create a server" button. - Notice the "create" button on the top right corner. Long-hold the "create" button. - Notice the highlighting area.
